column1: People from all age groups are now being infected by Corona virus. It is proving dangerous to those who are already having serious diseases. All Nations are trying their best to stop it. UNO, WHO,World Bank and charitable Institutions should help to stop it's further spreading.

Corona virus is harming, family and social life very badly. Economically also it is causing a great hardships, due to continuous lock downs. But this the only option which can ensure our safety and security globally. Let us bear it till the lock downs are removed in phases.
